text:
This is a 55 y/o F hx HCV on IFN, cryoglobulinemia, dysphagia,
   progressive neuromuscular weakness followed by neurology now s/p trach
   after intubation for aspiration pneumonia and persistent difficulty
   weaning from vent.
   Respiratory failure, acute (not ARDS/[**Doctor Last Name 76**])
   Assessment:
   Recvd the pt on 40% trach collor,satting 95-100%,ronchorous breath
   sounds,thick yellow secretions coming around the trach,
   Action:
   No further changes in fi02,trach care given MDI
s by RT,suctioned as
   needed.
   Response:
   Pt remains comfortable on current fio2.  Sats 100%.  Still with
   moderate amt of secretions from trach.  No resp distress noted.
   Plan:
   Continue to monitor, suctioned prn
   Myopathy, other (not of critical illness)
   Assessment:
   Known myopathy very restless and agitated,poor sleep,seems very
   anxious,c/o  pain at trach site,now with severe eye infection.  As per
   the family pt is a heavy smoker
   Action:
   Received ativan 1 mg x4 doses in this shift alsong with morphine 2 mg
   x2,contd all eye drops/ointments as per opthal, A nicotine patch has
   been applied.
   Response:
   Improvement noted  in the eyes,contd to have restlessness and pulling
   out wires and tubes,pt has pulled out the mushroom cath x2 in this
   shift,seems better after 0400am.
   Plan:
   Continue to monitor ,?increase the ativan dose or add a different drug
   regimen.
   Impaired Skin Integrity
   Assessment:
   Excoriated perineum,pt has pulled out the mushroom cath x2 in this
   shift,contd have loose bm,
   Action:
   Skin protectant applied ,turned and respositioned q2h,
   Response:
   Pt cont to have restlessness which prevents the successful drainage of
   the stool and infact lead to leaking,explained the pt but contd the
   same behavior,reinserted mushroom cath , diaper in place.
   Plan:
   Cont local skin care,turn and reposition ,
   T max 100.1 in this shift,urine cx sent,T current 97.8.
   Tube feed on hold since MN ?nerve biopsy in am.
   Received  15mmol k phos .
   Hr 85-120,sbp 130-160,received ns fluid bolus 1000cc x2 in this shift.
